channel.title: Teamviewer on droid
channel.description:
Last night I found the teamviewer app for droid phones, I must say I am VERY impressed.
I was playing runescape on my phone, (With a bit of lag I must say) playing music through my computer surround sound speakers without having to get up to pick a playlist, and basically anything else I would do at my computer.
http://teamviewer.com/download/mobile.aspx
Theres the mobile app, I defiantly recommended it.

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:10, topic:379673”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=475515.msg3481648#msg3481648 date=1296187048]
I use log me in ignition over 3g and I am getting about 2fps which is pretty decent I think. I can check on my runescape bots and I can see what is happening etc.

Well I tested teamviewer vs logmein. I have to say I though teamviewer was going to be better but it ended up being horrible. On Logmein I can actually play runescape real time there is only a lag of about 1/4second. On Teamviewer that is at least a 5 second lag and the color is horrible. So if any of you think this is great I encourage you to try LogMeIn Ignition.
[/quote]

Well, i’d use LogMeIn, but I don’t feel like paying 30$ for something I can get free. Theres nothing more I need from team viewer besides being able to check my torrents and bots basically…[/quote]

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=TT9N44IP

Read full topic

Well I tested teamviewer vs logmein. I have to say I though teamviewer was going to be better but it ended up being horrible. On Logmein I can actually play runescape real time there is only a lag of about 1/4second. On Teamviewer that is at least a 5 second lag and the color is horrible. So if any of you think this is great I encourage you to try LogMeIn Ignition.[/quote]

Well, i’d use LogMeIn, but I don’t feel like paying 30$ for something I can get free. Theres nothing more I need from team viewer besides being able to check my torrents and bots basically…

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

I use log me in ignition over 3g and I am getting about 2fps which is pretty decent I think. I can check on my runescape bots and I can see what is happening etc.

Well I tested teamviewer vs logmein. I have to say I though teamviewer was going to be better but it ended up being horrible. On Logmein I can actually play runescape real time there is only a lag of about 1/4second. On Teamviewer that is at least a 5 second lag and the color is horrible. So if any of you think this is great I encourage you to try LogMeIn Ignition.

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I use it at work and home and on all of my computers and devices. It’s nice to have a unified solution for accessing any device from any device. Plus on the iPhone it’s great for quickly checking my renders.

Read full topic

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I found this last night, and I connected through 3G connections and it worked pretty smooth. Hopefully they will fix the flaws that it has soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Newty:

I run a few runescape bots through a remote desktop connection and rs really isn’t playable through it imo. Is it bearable for you?

Well, I could walk from one place to another, check GE updates, ect, but couldn’t do something for a long time without raging about the horrible ping.

Read full topic

item.title: Teamviewer on droid
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Mopman:

…so its like vnc?

VNC doesn’t support sound, and also requires you have a publicly routable IP and a port forwarded through your firewall/router. So it’s different for sure.

Read full topic
